label: Tracker Update
info:
This flow listens for changes to each household-members trackers, and merges and updates the bayesian-tracker

The subflow takes 2 inputs:
- The binary\_sensor._person_\_presence
- The device\_tracker._person_\_gps

The subflow updates
- device\_tracker._person_\_bayesan

label: Notify
info: This subflow sends a message to be read aloud on the living-room speaker

name: Convert Bayesian Sensor into Device Tracker
Report
template: Performed {{topic}} ({{update.set_state}}) for {{update.person}}

name: Current
info: Fetch existing state of the Binary-sensor

name: Check if "Welcome Greetings" is turned on
Recieve message payload, and speak it
Welcome message
template: Welcome home, My Master. I live to serve you!

name: Report
template: Performed {{topic}} ({{update.set_state}}) for {{update.person}}

name: Welcome message
template: Welcome home, {{update.person}}. You are the best wife in the galaxy!

name: Welcome message
template: Welcome home, {{update.person}}. You bring light and warmth to this bleak place, and brighten my dark days!

name: Welcome message
template: Welcome home, Bad-ass Bobby. I really love how your big brain makes your eyes sparkle with wit and intelligence.

name: Welcome message
template: Welcome home, Princess Trym. You're a very handsome young man

info: Fetch existing state of the Binary-sensor

name: Report

template: Updating GPS position for {{update.person}} to {{update.existing_state}} - {{update.gps.latitude}},{{update.gps.longitude}}.

name: Report
